CustomField.formula:
If(OR(Number_of_Open_Invoices_posted__c = 2, AND(Days_Since_Most_Recent_Heartbeat__c > 7, Days_Since_Most_Recent_Heartbeat__c < 14)), 'Yellow',
If(OR(Number_of_Open_Invoices_posted__c >= 3, (Days_Since_Most_Recent_Heartbeat__c >= 14), (Cancellation_Requested__c = True), (Pause_Requested__c = True)),'Red', 'Green'))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Yellow : 2 Open invoices OR 8-14 days since heartbeat between Red: 3+ open invoices, 14+ days since heartbeat, cancellation/pause requested
CustomField.label: Health Stoplight Color
